atoms.text:
### Welcome to Udacity!

I am Sebastian, the founder of Udacity.

Our mission is to power careers through tech education. We’re honored that you’ve chosen us to help in your career journey. Whether embarking on a new path. Curious about a new field. Or advancing in your own field. I want you to know, you’re in the right place. We are here to help you accomplish your goals.

I can’t wait to see where this journey takes you!

atoms.title: Welcome To Your Nanodegree Experience V2

atoms.text:
If this is your first Nanodegree program, welcome.
If you have taken a Nanodegree program with us before, you already know a little bit of what to expect. Udacity is always improving our learning experience for students. So you can watch this to see what is changed or skip ahead. You can also read this in the FAQ located in the resources tab.

Let’s get started. 

We truly believe you couldn’t have chosen a better place to learn. A lot of people have worked tirelessly to create the course material and platform features, as we all want you to get the most of your learning journey. Our pledge is to provide you with resources and services that will further enable you to succeed in your Nanodegree program. As you go through the lessons, you may find some to be difficult and may feel discouraged. If this happens, we encourage you to take advantage of your community channels and mentor services to help clarify the concepts, or just to share your doubts. Our mentors are there to help you! You will get advice and guidance to ensure you are on track to complete the projects. We WANT you to succeed and graduate with a Udacity Nanodegree certificate.

We value the trust you have put in us by making this investment in your future career. We take it seriously and we are here to help you achieve whatever you came here to accomplish.

# Meet Your Instructors
We have great instructors for each of the courses in this Nanodegree program. All of them bring expertise from working in the industry and experience teaching others. Below you can hear about their involvement in the field, and you'll learn more about them during the courses they teach.

Welcome to the Introduction to Cybersecurity Nanodegree Program! My name is Alison Rodal, and I worked with a talented team of cybersecurity experts and curriculum designers to put this program together. We are excited to have you join us!

Why Cybersecurity? Technology use is more advanced and more widespread than ever before with the rise of smartphones, connected devices, cloud services, video conference calls, and enormous amounts of data accessible from seemingly everywhere. This rise in technology use brings with it a rise in security and data breaches. The global average cost of a data breach to a company is $3.9 million, and in the United States alone it rises to $8 million; ransomware attacks grow at an annual rate of 350%. The damage caused by breaches, and the resources to prevent them is top of mind for any organization.

In this Nanodegree program, you will be introduced to the skills necessary to launch your cybersecurity career and play a critical role in protecting a company’s data and infrastructure. Companies today are seeking cybersecurity professionals who can assess threats, respond to incidents, and implement security controls at such high volume that employers are struggling to find workers to fill the roles. The demand for security professionals is growing by over 30% and according to the 2019 Cybersecurity Workforce Study, there will be 3 million unfilled jobs in the field by 2022. Roles such as security analyst, security engineer, and cybersecurity manager lead the pack as the most in demand roles according to the National Initiative for Cybersecurity Education (NICE). There is no better time than now to meet the demand for cybersecurity professionals and we are excited to help you achieve your goals!

Through interactive lesson content, exercises, and hands-on projects, you will apply your new skills, and respond to actual scenarios that demonstrate your expertise in fundamental security tasks. You will learn how to evaluate specific industry standard security techniques used to administer a system, maintain the security of a network, computing environment or application, and apply control techniques to secure a computer system. You will also conduct a threat assessment and create a compliance program designed to reduce risk and secure the assets of an organization. These skills will set you up to begin your career as a cybersecurity professional. You will learn from some of the top professionals in the industry who have consulted numerous companies on implementing and improving security architecture, led threat hunting and incident response tactics, oversaw cybersecurity functions within Fortune 100 companies, and helped enterprises navigate compliance and regulatory requirements. 

Every project you submit gets reviewed, and our project reviewers will provide personalized feedback on how you can improve your work. By completing this program, you will launch your career as a cybersecurity professional and be prepared for the next step in your journey. We are excited and honored that you are taking this step with us!
